review: I have had 2 Roku (Roku 1 & 3).  My young daughters can easily use them.  I purchased the Google Chrome from Best Buy on sale.  It does not compare to Roku.  Roku has a remote.  I was unaware that I needed to use my smartphone with an App to use the Chromecast.  How can my children use this?  Simply they can't.  I certainly don't want to have to make sure my cell phone is charged just to be able to watch tv either.  I returned it within 2 days of purchase.
